sol_rpc.init_arg: ( record { manageApiKeys = null; overrideProvider = opt record { overrideUrl = opt record { pattern = ".*"; replacement = "https://api.devnet.solana.com" } }; logFilter = opt variant { ShowAll }; numSubnetNodes = null; mode = opt variant { Demo }; } )
